org.webcurator.domain.model.auth
Class User

java.lang.Object
  org.webcurator.domain.model.auth.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class User
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

The User object holds the information related to a logged in User.

Author:
bprice
See Also:

isActive

public boolean isActive()
checks if this account is actually active

Returns:
true if the account is still active

setActive

public void setActive(boolean active)
Sets if this account is active.

Parameters:
active - true to set the account active; false to set it inactive.

isExternalAuth

public boolean isExternalAuth()
checks if the User is defined as being Authenticated Externally. A User that is Authenticated externally must have their password credentials stored in an external repository, like a Directory server. Refer to the wct-security.xml for configuration parameters for external authentication sources.

Returns:
true if this user is authenticated externally

setExternalAuth

public void setExternalAuth(boolean externalAuth)
Sets whether to use the internal or an extrernal authentication source. See the wct-security.xml file for configuration parameters for the external authentication sources.

Parameters:
externalAuth - True to enable external authentication; false to use the internal database authentication.

the users firstname

Set the first name of the user.

Parameters:
firstname - The user's first name.

isForcePasswordChange

public boolean isForcePasswordChange()
checks to see if a user is forced to change their password at logon

Returns:
true if they must change password

setForcePasswordChange

public void setForcePasswordChange(boolean forcePasswordChange)
Force the user to change their password on their next logon.

Parameters:
forcePasswordChange - true to force a password change on logon.

getNiceName

public java.lang.String getNiceName()
Get a shortened name for display purposes. For example, John Smith will be shortened to "J. Smith".

Returns:
A display name for the user.

getFullName

public java.lang.String getFullName()
Get full name for display purposes. For example, John Smith

Returns:
A full name for the user.

isNotificationsByEmail

public boolean isNotificationsByEmail()
checks if this user is notified by email for events in the system.

Returns:
true if the user is notified via email

setNotificationsByEmail

public void setNotificationsByEmail(boolean notifyByEmail)
Set whether the user wishes to be notified of system events by e-mail in addition to receiving the notifications in the WCT in tray.

Parameters:
notifyByEmail - true to enable notification by e-mail.
